metadata.dc:author: Jiménez Arteaga, S D
Jauregui, R
García Hernández, N
Barba, R
metadata.dc:description: The history of a 12 year old male, who developed a bidirectional tachycardia and sudden death without evidence of neurological or cardiac disease is described. The role of bidirectional tachycardia related to sudden death is discussed, as well as its possible origin and mechanisms, based on the case described.
metadata.dc:title: Muerte súbita por taquicardia bidireccional en un adolescente.
[Sudden death caused by 2-directional tachycardia in an adolescent].
metadata.dc:publisher: Archivos del Instituto de Cardiologia de Mexico
